titles.title: Reclamation Groundwater Management and Technical Assistance Study Act of 1988
Reclamation Groundwater Management and Technical Assistance Study Act of 1988
A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to conduct the Reclamation Groundwater Management and Technical Assistance Study.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Water and Power.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Interior Department, OMB.
Subcommittee on Water and Power. Hearings held.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston under the authority of the order of Aug 11, 88 with an amendment. With written report No. 100-489.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 911.

bill.summary: 8/25/1988--Reported to Senate amended. (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources with amendment, S. Rept. 100-489) Reclamation Groundwater Management and Technical Assistance Study Act of 1988 - Authorizes appropriations for FY 1989 and following fiscal years for the Secretary of the Interior, through the Bureau of Reclamation, to prepare a Reclamation Groundwater Management and Technical Assistance Study for the Congress. Requires the Secretary to consult with the affected States in the preparation of the Study.
